item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Rodrygo lined up by Arsenal, Man City
item.description: Premier League sides Arsenal and Manchester City are potential destinations for Real Madrid's Rodrygo. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Seven questions Liverpool must answer in January
item.description: The January transfer window is open, and top clubs like Liverpool have big and expensive decisions to make.
